name: Moonrise Mall
description:
Introduction

It's the 22nd century. Water has become scarce, but you need it, so you drive to an abandoned mall to get some.

Credits

Y Bot Character from Mixamo

Brutal to Happy Walking, Idle, and Zombie Attack Animations from Mixamo

Mini First Person Controller by Simon Pasi on the Unity Asset Store

Amazing Mall Asset Pack by MYNEX on the Unity Asset Store

Free breathing sound effect from https://fesliyanstudios.com

Merchant Copy Font from https://www.1001fonts.com/merchant-copy-font.html#license
